featured.text: But the captain of a ship is responsible for guiding the vessel until they hit a port, waiting to enter the harbor.
The task of bringing the ship into the harbor and anchoring it is taken up by a different captain.
A marine pilot is a boat pilot with specialized knowledge of a particular port or harbor.

definition.en_def: A place on the coast where vessels may find shelter.
definition.example: The ship docked safely in the harbor.
